subject: Golf
Athletics and Sports
organizations: Target World Challenge at Sherwood Country Club
lead_paragraph: In a near-perfect ending to a spectacular 2007 season, Tiger Woods tied up a lot of loose ends Sunday in the Target World Challenge at Sherwood Country Club, winning over Zach Johnson by seven strokes.
snippet: In a near-perfect ending to a spectacular 2007 season, Tiger Woods tied up a lot of loose ends Sunday in the Target World Challenge at Sherwood Country Club, winning over Zach Johnson by seven strokes.
